alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Las Vegas Valley; Northeast Clark County; Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 01 at 2:14PM PST until February 02 at 7:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southern Nevada and southeast California. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 7 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects or temporary structures. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few brief power outages may result. Periods of blowing dust could also result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Las Vegas Valley; Northeast Clark County; Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
